explanation: [0-0] Inside the cabin of a passenger plane, a man wearing 3D glasses is sitting in his seat and raising his right hand. A flight attendant is behind him checking if the luggage compartment is closed. Many passengers in different clothes are sitting in the seats behind him. Black subtitles appear in the picture.

[0-3] The man waves his arms excitedly to experience the virtual scene brought by the glasses. The flight attendant passes by the man after checking. The man accidentally touches the flight attendant with his hand. The man withdraws his raised arm in horror and looks in that direction. Then the man continues to wave his arm in the other direction.

[3-10] The image in the man's glasses appears in the picture. The image is still in an aircraft cabin but with more luxurious facilities. A hand puts a video page from the right in front of him and gently moves a finger to enlarge the picture. Then the hand slides the page to find the video, and then zooms out the video page and puts it back on the right.
